word: Oh, my soul, why not leave the cursed thing today? Sin crucified my Lord. Why not turn from it with loathing? Why not love the things that Christ loved, and hate the things that Christ hated? He has made provision ample enough for you that you can, through Him, be more, yea, more than overcomers.--Manuscript 35, Sept. 26, 1891, "Work and Baptism of Holy Spirit Needed."
